title: Weapon Safety and Handling Guide
introduction: Guidelines for the safe storage, handling, and use of service weapons in various scenarios.

sections.heading: General Firearm Safety
sections.content: Always treat every firearm as if it is loaded. Keep the muzzle pointed in a safe direction. Keep your finger off the trigger until ready to shoot. Be sure of your target and what is beyond it.

sections.heading: Handling Explosives (Basic)
sections.content: Only trained personnel should handle explosives. Follow all standard operating procedures. Be aware of blast radius and potential hazards. Secure unused explosives properly.

sections.heading: Weapon Maintenance
sections.content: Regular cleaning and inspection are vital for weapon reliability. Use appropriate cleaning kits. Store weapons in dry, secure locations.

note: This content is classified for military personnel only.
